titles: The aduentures of Brusanus Prince of Hungaria, pleasant for all to read, and profitable for some to follow. / Written by Barnaby Riche, seauen or eight yeares sithence, and now published by the great intreaty of diuers of his freendes.
author: Rich, Barnabe, 1540?-1617.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
keywords: English fiction --  Early modern, 1500-1700 --  Early works to 1800.
